column4: Exclusive: Microsoft takes aim at Amazon with push for checkout-free retail
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Microsoft Corp  is working on technology that would eliminate cashiers and checkout lines from stores  in a nascent challenge to Amazon.com Inc's  automated grocery shop  six people familiar with the matter told Reuters. | Video

column4: China regulators approve Qualcomm-NXP Semiconductors merger deal -SCMP
column5: June 14 Chinese regulators have approved Qualcomm Inc's proposed merger with NXP Semiconductors   South China Morning Post reported on Thursday  citing people with knowledge of the matter.
